name: NVIDIA RTX 4070 Super
image_prompt: NVIDIA GeForce RTX 4070 Super graphics card, Founders Edition, dual fan design, titanium and black shroud
description: Next-gen gaming GPU with 16GB GDDR6X memory and DLSS 3.5 support. Features ray tracing, AI-powered features, and excellent 1440p gaming performance with low power consumption.

reviews.review_text: DLSS 3.5 is magic. Smooth 4K gaming on demanding titles.
Perfect for ML dev work. CUDA cores handle training well.
Great card but wish it had more VRAM for future proofing.
